# News

## April 30, 2025
- **New Project Launched**: We are excited to announce the launch of a new project on "Integrated Coastal Water Monitoring and Modeling."

## April 25, 2025
- **New Blog Post**: Check out our latest blog post on "How to Make Dynamic Maps with Python."

## April 26, 2025
- **New Research Published**: Our latest research on ecological modeling has been published in the Journal of Environmental Science.
- **Upcoming Workshop**: Join us for a workshop on "Dynamic Mapping with Python" on May 15, 2025.
- **PhD Milestone**: I am thrilled to announce that I have passed my PhD candidacy exam and am now officially a PhD candidate!

## April 20, 2025
- **Website Update**: The blog has been updated with new posts on PCA and Machine Learning in Oceanography.
